ygData.subject: Re: Specialization and Research
ygData.msgSnippet: Only one specialization can raise above 50 and it s on first come first serve. It was in an update sometime this past summer. If you want to have a certain
ygData.messageBody:
Only one specialization can raise above 50 and it's on first come first
serve. It was in an update sometime this past summer. If you want to have a
certain specialization to be above 50 then practice it alot more that you do
your others.
Eci server


>From: "Joe Wallace" <joew88@...>
>Reply-To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
>To: <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
>Subject: Re: [eq_wizards] Specialization and Research
>Date: Wed, 5 Jan 2000 21:38:20 -0800
>
>No, I am pretty sure that only 1 skill can ever go above 50. I remember
>asking a gm about it, and he that's what he told me. Additionally, only my
>primary specialization, evocation, has ever risen above 50. All the others
>got to 50 and stopped dead. I had practiced evocation, actually, up to 50
>and wondered why it wouldn't go higher. That's when the gm told me that
>there needed to be 1 point in all of them to get them started before one
>would rise above 50. I don't remember if he said that was a bug or
>intentional.
>
>
>
>
>
> > From: "Zinken" <zinken@...>
> >
> > Yes but i think it�s 2 skills that can be taken above the 50 mark. and
